backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with storage mixins, authorization, and data types for schools, staff, payments, packing, training, academic queries, and audit logs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with linked files, components, tests, and confidence levels for audit and traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files used for route handling, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens, themes, and base UI variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query and TanStack Router, wraps app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, role-based sidebar, logout handling, and outlet rendering.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Renders role-specific navigation links based on staff role with mobile and desktop variants.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: Searchable school list component with filters and context-specific navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data using the actor, covering profiles, staff, schools, and other modules.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Displays academic queries with filtering and provides a dialog to respond and update query status.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Manages school payments, including listing, creating, editing, and uploading PDF proofs. Uses dialogs, tables, and queries to handle payment data and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Displays and filters audit logs with search and entity-type filtering. Renders logs in a table with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Lists staff profiles and provides dialogs to create or update staff information. Integrates form handling, validation, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Shows counts of open and resolved academic queries with summary cards. Provides navigation to the full queries list.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Displays total school count and provides a school search panel for accounts tasks. Fetches school data and shows a summary card.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Shows totals for schools, staff, and audit logs plus a recent activity list. Uses summary cards and recent log preview.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Shows total schools and includes tools for school registration and search. Provides marketing-focused navigation and summary.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Displays packing status metrics like pending dispatch and total schools. Includes a search panel tailored for packing operations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Displays training dashboard with counts of schools and open academic queries plus a school search panel.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login screen using Internet Identity and redirects users based on role and profile status.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Provides a form to create a new school and submit it via mutation with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Loads a schoolâ€™s packing status, allows editing kit/add-on counts and dispatch info, and updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Shows school details with editable fields for authorized roles and updates the school via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Manages training visits and academic queries for a school, including file upload for visit proofs.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Lists all academic queries raised by the user with status badges and optional responses.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines all application routes, including login, authenticated layout, role-based redirects, and department-specific dashboard and school pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend UI theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, including architecture notes, RBAC-driven features, and requirements for the multi-department school management system.
